column4: Id of the plant site (eg DC)
The identification code of the industrial complex. (eg: I-Chain)
The name of industrial complex. (eg: Isophorone Chain)
ID of the Process Plant (eg ABC)
Name of the process plant (eg: ABC plant)
The identification code of the plant area according to ISA-95 (eg F4)
The name of the plant area according to ISA-95. (eg Area G4)
The identification code of the plant section. (eg: 10)
The name of the plant section. (eg: Utilities)
Identification Code of the plant (eg: X123)
Name of the Plant System. (eg: System X123)
